name: Higher Ground (itch)
description:
Higher Ground

If you can't control the player with the movement keys reload this page (there's a bug that disables the keys).

Instructions

Use WASD or Arrow Keys to control the white marshmallow. Don't fall into the water. Don't get touched by the red spikes. Pink jelly makes you bounce and gives you a boost.

Credits

Thanks to Turbowarp.org for generating the HTML file for me. Thanks to Google for the fonts! Thanks to Engelwood for the soundtrack "crystal dolphin"!

Please visit PandaTimmyMrT on YouTube and PandaTimmyMrT on Scratch

Notes: If you can't control the player with the movement keys reload this page (there's a bug that disables the keys).
